meanings.definition: The position or rank of a cadet.
meanings.sent1: In the military, cadetships are earned through hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent2: She was proud to receive a promotion to a higher cadetship.
meanings.sent3: The cadetships lined up in formation, looking sharp and disciplined.
meanings.sent4: His cadetship shone brightly among his peers, showing his leadership qualities.
meanings.sent5: The cadetships stood tall and proud, ready to take on any challenge.

meanings.definition: A program or training course for cadets.
meanings.sent1: The cadetship included physical training and academic classes.
meanings.sent2: Many young individuals enroll in cadetships to learn valuable skills.
meanings.sent3: During the cadetship, they learned how to march in perfect unison.
meanings.sent4: The cadetship was a journey of growth and self-discovery for the recruits.
meanings.sent5: Participating in the cadetship helped them develop teamwork and discipline.
